d1e3.d: Cabo Fish Taco a small Mexican Chain Restaurant that lives right on South Main Street in Blacksburg. They server a verity of fresh seafood through Mexican style dishes such as tacos, burritos, and quesadillas.

d1e10.d: 662 North is known for there fancy foods and high class wine tastings. This place is a formal restaurant and wine bar which creates is romantic atmosphere.

d1e17.t: One. Zeppoli's Italian Restaurant & Wine Shop
d1e17.d: Last but not least the best Italian place in Blacksburg is Zeppoli's Italian Restaurant & Wine Shop. This place is famous for its homemade pasta and sauces. As well as whole wine shop within the restaurant.

d1e24.t: Best Restaurants in Blacksburg for a Date!
d1e24.d: Introducing the Best Restaurants in Blacksburg to go for a Dinner Date!

d1e31.d: Green's Grill & Sushi Bar very close to the Virginia Tech campus comes in third on my list. This place servers a little bit of everything between burgers and your favorite sushi roll.

d1e39.d: PK's Bar & Grill is a local bar and pizza kitchen. They are famous for there handmade pizza crust and traditional wings. They are also a sports bar with TVs lining all around, pool tables, TouchTunes and darts.
